hypothesis: Retrospective across 342 sessions reveals 3-5 generalizable meta-patterns about self-improving systems that transfer beyond this swarm instance
method: Two parallel expert agents: (1) arc-pattern analysis (SESSION-LOG, PRINCIPLES, ISOMORPHISM-ATLAS, HUMAN-SIGNALS, DEPS), (2) mechanism/tool evolution analysis (councils, genesis, invariants, experiments). Synthesis by parent node.

novel_patterns.name: Tool-to-Swarm developmental spectrum
novel_patterns.measurement: 14/22 at stage 4-5, 8/22 at stage 2-3, 0/22 at stage 1

novel_patterns.name: Cross-domain ISO indexing provides O(N*K) compression
novel_patterns.mechanism: 19 ISOs × 430 lessons = 8170 potential retroactive cross-links without new data

novel_patterns.name: Expansion-compression breathing at era scale
novel_patterns.measurement: 7 eras across 342 sessions, 3 expansion + 3 compression + 1 current

confirmed_existing_patterns: P-175 structural vs behavioral enforcement tiers
findings.dominant_constraint: P-213 closed epistemic loop — all metrics, analysis, and insights route through same self-referential channel. The retrospective itself is inside the loop.

diff: More patterns than expected (5 vs 3-5). The 5-stage spectrum is genuinely novel — not in any prior lesson. The O(N*K) compression framing extends L-492 with a mechanism explanation.
